contact.name: name
contact.title: Title
context: Consent to the Collection and Use of Personal Information (Required)

1. Purpose: Provision of responses for customer inquiries and management of inquiry status
2. Collection Items: Name, contact information, e-mail address, company(affiliation)
3. Retention Period: For 36 months from the date on which the consent is given
You have the right to refuse to provide consent to the collection and use of
your personal information. However, please note that if you fail to provide consent,
the submission of your inquiry will be restricted.
contact.check: I agree to the collection and use of personal information.
contact.register: Please enter the verification numbers in order.
